sentences.english: On his arrival, the pontiff circled the park packed stadium in his popemobile.
sentences.chinese: 教皇到達後，乘坐其座駕環繞滿是人羣的體育場。

sentences.english: And they ascended up to heaven in a cloud;
He flew over the Great Wall in a paraglider .
sentences.chinese: 他駕着滑翔傘飛越了長城。

sentences.english: But where is the silver chariot headed?
sentences.chinese: 但那駕銀製馬車將前往何方？

sentences.english: He made him ride on the high places of the earth, that he might eat the increase of the fields;
sentences.chinese: 耶和華使他乘駕地的高處，得喫田間的土產。

sentences.english: Driving without a driver's license is against the traffic law.
sentences.chinese: 沒有駕就照開車是違反交通法的。

sentences.english: The newlyweds ride a carriage across Westminster Bridge after their wedding ceremony on July 29, 1981.
sentences.chinese: 典禮之後新婚夫婦駕馬車駛過威斯敏斯特大橋。

sentences.english: For six months I drove around town with that busted car.
sentences.chinese: 六個月後我駕着那輛破車在鎮裏四處逛。

sentences.english: He used to be pottering about in a canoe on summer afternoons.
sentences.chinese: 他過去常常在夏日午後駕輕舟盪漾。

sentences.english: We drove in a buggy past the Dorset house.
sentences.chinese: 我們駕了一輛單騎獨座的小馬車經過道塞特家的住宅。

sentences.english: And when you did the outside loop last week.
sentences.chinese: 你上週駕飛機在空中翻筋斗。

sentences.english: We drove in a buggy past the dorset house .
sentences.chinese: 我們駕了一輛單騎獨座的小馬車經過道塞特家的住宅。

sentences.english: Standing at the baggage passing time:Austin Texas airport—my ride hasn't come yet.
sentences.chinese: 奧斯汀得克薩斯機場我的乘駕未來。

sentences.english: "Monsieur," said he, "where is the court-house, if you please."
sentences.chinese: “先生，”他說，“勞您駕，法院在什麼地方？”

sentences.english: So Hing Lake of All of a sudden have a, driving securinine Adventures, 10000 ares beautiful waves.
sentences.chinese: 於是遊湖之興頓生，駕一葉輕舟，徜徉萬頃波濤。

sentences.english: One of the high points of the winter sleigh ride is roasting marshmallows on an open fire.
sentences.chinese: 冬季駕雪橇最受歡迎的活動之一是圍着篝火烤棉花糖。
